ygData.subject: Eerie Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: As a bard, I have been working on some ballads to perform for others.  This si my latest one that I thought I would share with the group.  I don t mind if you
ygData.messageBody:
As a bard, I have been working on some ballads to perform for others. This
si my latest one that I thought I would share with the group. I don't mind
if you use it. I think part of a Bard's job is to spread the works of others
as well as create works of their own. I do that myself, and I try to give
credit to the original poet if I know who it is. Anyway, here it is:


In the deep, dark wood
Of eerie Kithicor
See the bixies flit about
Hear the horrible kodiak roar

In the deep, dark wood
Of eerie Kithicor
The halflings play in their cool glen
Not far from Highhold Pass´┐¢s door

In the deep, dark wood
Of eerie Kithicor
Settlers proud and noble died
Defending us from zombie hordes

In the deep, dark wood
Of eerie Kithicor
Abandoned, burned and haunted homes
Remnants of the things they wore

In the deep, dark wood
Of eerie Kithicor
An undead ghoul took my friend´┐¢s life
Now it´┐¢s time to settle the score

In the deep, dark wood
Of eerie Kithicor
